input_text:
THEATER ARTS TEACHER & PROGRAM DIRECTOR

SUMMARY

Passionate and dedicated Theater Arts Teacher with expertise in secondary curriculum development, classroom management, relationship building, continued professional development and management of a successful Theater Arts program for over six years.
Highlights
Valid and Current Teaching Certification in Texas Strong communication skills Talented public speaker
Talented mediator Self-motivated Results-oriented
